title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 221.15 - Sales slips
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 221.15 - Sales slips

State Regulations

When a commodity not in a container is of such composition or
form that it is impossible or impracticable to place a marking on or attach a
tag or label to such commodity, a sales slip containing all the information
required to be furnished by this Part shall be delivered to the purchaser at
the time of the sale and in such case no other marking will be required. Such a
sales slip shall be entirely clear and equal to printing in
legibility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
221.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
